channel.title: Whonix doesn't run on an encrypted flash drive
channel.description: Good afternoon. I appeal to you, because I could not find the correct answer. On the encrypted flash drive installed Debian 9, which works quite correctly. But as I run Virtualbox with Whonix, I/o error is constantly issued, sometimes immediately, sometimes after working for some time. Put debian on a hard drive, there were no problems with Whonix. I assume that the problem with the flash drive. Just do not know how to decide with any settings, or the choice of another flash drive. Thank you for your help.

item.title: Whonix doesn't run on an encrypted flash drive

item.description:
Hi ekstorm9545

Are you using a hardware encrypted drive or luks? You should use luks FDE.
